data.title: University System of Georgia
data.text:
Address and Directions

Address

1005 George J. Lyons Parkway

Sandersville, GA 31082

(478) 240-6500

If George J. Lyons is not recognized by GPS, you may use the following address for Oconee Fall Line Technical College located across the street:

1189 Deepstep Road

Sandersville, GA 31082

Directions

From Milledgeville

Travel east on GA Hwy 24 approximately 25 miles

At the first traffic light, turn left onto Deepstep Road

Turn right onto George J. Lyons Parkway, Research and Industrial Park

The Shared Services Center will be on your left

From Atlanta

Travel east on Interstate 20

Take exit 138, and follow GA Hwy 15 S through the towns of Siloam, White Plains, Sparta, and Warthen

At the traffic light, turn right onto Fall Line Fwy, GA Hwy 24/88 toward Milledgeville

At the second traffic light, turn right onto Deepstep Road

Turn right onto George J. Lyons Parkway, Research and Industrial Park

The Shared Services Center will be on your left

From Macon (may want to revise for the new by pass)

Travel east on GA Hwy 49

Continue east on GA Hwy 24 approximately 25 miles

At the first traffic light, turn left onto Deepstep Road

Turn right onto George J. Lyons Parkway, Research and Industrial Park

The Shared Services Center will be on your left

From Valdosta

Travel north on US Hwy 221 to US Hwy 441 to Dublin

Turn left onto US Hwy 319 N to Wrightsville

Turn left onto GA Hwy 15 N to Sandersville

Turn left onto Fall Line Fwy, GA Hwy 24/88

At the second traffic light, turn right onto Deepstep Road

Turn right onto George J. Lyons Parkway, Research and Industrial Park

The Shared Services Center will be on your left

Pictures of the building
